storyInfo: In preparation for his subsequent trip to Kazdel, Enforcer goes looking for several of Rhodes Island's Sarkaz operators.

attributes.content: Alright... I've made note of all of that.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: I can't thank you enough, Vigna.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Don't sweat it! Not much I could help with anyway.
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: I couldn't answer any of your questions about Kazdel... Real sorry about that.
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: No, that's not the case at all.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: The fact that you were willing to teach me about Sarkaz customs is already a huge help. Thanks to you, I've already learned a lot.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Don't mention it... But, I'll tell you this again. It's whatever since you're on Rhodes Island, but don't assume that all Sarkaz are this easy to talk to!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: If you were in Kazdel, the situation would be different. Completely different!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Yeah, I get it.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: You clearly don't get it at all! Take Adnachiel for example. Even with how good his temper is, the two of us didn't talk 'til we'd known each other for a long time!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: But in your case, how many days has it been since you joined? When you just casually sauntered up to me for the first time, I thought you had some kind of problem with me!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Ah, I see. So that was the reason why you were on guard...
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: This is already pretty good, by my standards!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Ugh... Anyway, just be careful out there.
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: The way you are right now, I'm real worried that you'll end up dead in a ditch somewhere long before you ever reach Kazdel.
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Ahaha... I'll do my best to keep that from happening.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Putting all that aside, thank you for your concern, Vigna.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: (Information on Kazdel is still extremely scant.)
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: (Most of the Sarkaz here with rather moderate attitudes grew up in other countries, and have little understanding of the place as a result.)
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: (However, one thing everyone can agree on is the fact that it's dangerous there. Ugh, it's not sufficiently safe for me to go with Cecelia alone. We can't set off without preparation...)
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: (But, it might be difficult getting any more information, given the status quo.)
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: (Let's see who I can talk to next...)
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Coming through.
Oh, certainly. Excuse me...
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: (Wait, no! This guy...!)
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Excuse me!
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: You're the Sarkaz blademaster, Flamebringer...
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: ...I've seen your face on a wanted poster at the Notarial Hall.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: A Sankta, huh? Out for revenge?
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: If it's a fight you want, you've got one. We'll take it outside.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: But step aside first. Wait until I water my flowers.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Plenty of executors and others at the Notarial Hall say it's a pretty bad idea to fight alone when encountering certain targets on the wanted list.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Also, this is Rhodes Island... so I will abide by the rules here.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Yeah? Suit yourself then.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: (This man... He's...)
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: (He doesn't seem wary of his surroundings in the slightest, and his body is relaxed... He is supremely confident in his combat capabilities.)
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: (He's so focused on the decorative plants that he didn't notice me pulling my gun...)
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: (What an incredibly dangerous individual. However...)
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Uh, Flamebringer, sir... Would you mind if I asked you a few questions?
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: About what?
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: What are you hoping to get out of me?
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: (He's still going about his business, watering his flowers without even pausing for me... It's as if my words mean nothing to him. Of course, not even a hint of anger either...)
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: (Phew... This might be the best chance I'll get.)
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: There are a few things I'd like to ask you about Kazdel.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: I want to know what the reality of the situation is there, like the size of the nearby towns and what kind of people are entering and leaving... I would really appreciate it if gave me some guidance.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: You're going to Kazdel?
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: If you've got a death wish, then go for it.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: It's not a death wish.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: I have my own reasons for needing to go to Kazdel.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: But I'm fully aware that given the current circumstances, setting out right now without making any preparations is tantamount to suicide.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: And I'm not about to do that, which is one of the reasons I've come to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Uh huh.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Don't block the light.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Acting recklessly, putting the lives of others and yourself at risk, is not bravery. It's just irresponsible.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: If I can learn as much as possible about the actual situation on the ground before I go, I'll be able to plan ahead and prepare accordingly.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Even though some degree of risk is inevitable, I'd at least like to avoid as much of it as possible.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: You don't have to talk so much.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Your story's got nothing to do with me, and I'm not interested in your philosophizing.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Ugh, out of water...
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Also should get around to pruning these branches and leaves...
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: ...It looks like it's only lush on one side, probably due to uneven light exposure.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Rather than trimming off the unbalanced parts yourself, it might be better to rotate and let the other side get some sunlight.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Cut off the excess branches and leaves, and the flowers will bloom better.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: The more options you have, the more likely you are to miss the point. That's how it is with plants.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: But... who gets to decide what the 'point' of growth is for another living being?
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Who?
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: The strong get to decide.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: ...I'm afraid we'll have to agree to disagree on that one, Flamebringer.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: While it's true that this plant, after being pruned, might be more beautiful in appearance and grow more of its eagerly-awaited flowers...
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: I believe that a living being with a consciousness should be free to decide how it wishes to grow.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: The Sarkaz blademaster utters a single, absent-minded syllable.
His work does not stop once, during the course of Ezell's lengthy questioning.
When the watering can is empty, he sets it aside for the time being and starts pruning the overgrown branches and leaves.
Now, he conveniently keeps the shears next to the pruned potted plants.

In a heartbeat, the glint from the knife's blade slices through the inch of sunlight shining on the flowers. Ezell slams his back against the wall, hard, the sharp blade grazing his cheek before lodging into the wall behind him.
Urghâ€“!
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: A silver tongue's not gonna save you.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: What about now?
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Do you still have a reason to go?
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Vigna, why are you so late today?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Sorry, I stopped to chat with someone on the way here, and it ended up taking a while.
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Oh... It was Mister Ezell, right?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: That's right. How'd you know, Hibiscus?
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Because I was the one who sent him your way.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: That Sankta guy came to ask me and Lava some questions, but unfortunately we weren't able to help much.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: What? Is that weird Lateran fella still going around asking everyone what they know about Kazdel?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: He's not being discreet about it at all, huh... How many people has he asked by now?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: He's not seriously planning to take a little kid to Kazdel, is he? Does he have any clue how dangerous it is going around searching for someone with those two shiny targets above their heads?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Yeah, I also think it's way too dangerous!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: I really hope he manages to find some better way though...
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: What are you discussing?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Oh, Mudrock!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: We were just talking about a Sankta guy who joined recently...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Urk...!
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Please... let go...!
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Why don't you shoot me in the gut? Is this all the resistance you can muster?
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: You want to go to Kazdel with that toy gun of yours? Who do you think is gonna be convinced by your high-minded ideas?
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Ungh!
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: (This overwhelming power... He's seriously going to kill me!)
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: If you want info, you can talk to the Vampire doctor, or maybe that Kal'tsit woman.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: If you have time to play Twenty Questions here, why not directly ask your superiors? How many of Laterano's missions do you think revolve around Kazdel anyway?
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: How many Sankta souls do you think this blade has gorged on?
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: I... *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: I appreciate the warning...
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: But I still hope... to hear the truth about Kazdel in your words.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: You should understand by now.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: I had my blade speak for me.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Fool.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: *cough*... Wait! Hold on a second...
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: You don't get to ask me to wait, boy.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Why... didn't you kill me?
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Life won't flourish without the right nutrients. The same's true for plants and people alike.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Now scram, boy.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: You don't water flowers with blood.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: (That pure malice... He was absolutely ready to kill me just now...)
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: (Nothing I said... did any good at all. He didn't bat an eye at my words...)
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: (He even took the watering can with him when he left...)
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: So, that's a real Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Oww...
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Are you sure you don't need me to bandage you up, Enforcer?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: You're still bleeding...
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: It's no big deal, just a scratch.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Flamebringer didn't actually do anything to me... Well, at least he didn't kill me outright.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Alright, the wound should be properly dressed now.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: I still have some arrangements to make, so I'll head out for now.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Huh? Wait, Enforcer!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Did you need something else from me?
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Even though personal conflicts are theoretically forbidden on Rhodes Island, not everyone is so disciplined...
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: If you encounter a situation like that again, do your best to contact the Doctor, Amiya, or Dr. Kal'tsit directly.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Alright... Uhh, well, I'll see what I can do.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Most importantly...
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: There are a number of Sarkaz operators in Rhodes Island who've had... certain experiences in the past. In your case, it might be extremely dangerous for you to try to approach them.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Please be careful.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Thank you for the advice. I know my conduct carries great risk.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: But, Rhodes Island... is likely the best and most suitable place I'm ever going to find to have these kinds of conversations. Isn't that right?
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Had I met Flamebringer under any other circumstance, I'm afraid I wouldn't be here to tell the tale.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Th-That's true, but...!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: If I back down now, then the plan to go to Kazdel will fall apart.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: And I can't allow that. It hasn't gotten to the point yet where I have no choice but to give up.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: There's still one more person I should see...
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Excuse me.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Umm, are you... Mudrock?
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: ...I am.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: You know me... You came looking for me.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Yes, it may be presumptuous to say this on our first meeting. Nevertheless...
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: You're wounded.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: A fresh injury, caused by a sharp object. Just inflicted.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Did you run into someone on your way here?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: That would be Flamebringer.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Yes... Makes sense.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Even at Rhodes Island, the Sankta are warned not to approach certain people. Some of us are dangerous, including Flamebringer, including myself.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Didn't the Doctor and Amiya tell you that?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Yeah... The Doctor did try to talk me out of it.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: But you didn't listen.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: I've heard you're gathering information about Kazdel. You're planning to take that girl to find someone.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: That's right. I came to you hoping to get some help...
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: I don't understand... Why are you so insistent on going there yourself?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: You want to go to one of the most dangerous places for your kind, just the two of you Sankta... You should know how bad your idea is.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: I promised Cecelia that I'd take her to Kazdel to find her father. And I can't go back on my word.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: But I'm guessing that explanation won't satisfy you.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Hmm.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: I suppose it's like... going with the flow, in a way.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: I'm just an ordinary Sankta. If none of that stuff happened, the very idea of ever leaving Laterano probably would've never entered my head.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: I might've just been like everyone else, working and living a stable life, wanting for nothing, never having too many worries on my mind.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: And when I got older, I'd apply for retirement and live the rest of my days in peace and comfort, though it'd probably still get noisy every now and then.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Sounds like a good life.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: It is.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: But, when I started to see beyond the walls of Laterano, when I started coming into contact with viewpoints that are at odds with what I know, yet could not be denied...
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Then I, like any ordinary man, could no longer take that life for granted.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Cecelia gave me a chance. Honestly, I'm the one who needs to thank her.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Going to Kazdel isn't just a promise I made to her. It's also what I want to do.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: What you want to do?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: I'd love to see Kazdel for myself, and witness the lives of the people there.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: That's the reason why I've come to you, Mudrock, ma'am.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: I... want to understand the Sarkaz, the people we've been locked in conflict with forever. I want to know... are we actually the same?
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: If we were born the same, what is it that divides us now?
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: What is your plan?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Ahaha... As much as I'd love to say that I've already devised a plan to do all that...
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: The truth is, I'm having a hard time even gathering info...
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: That said, it's not like I haven't given it any thought at all. I just wouldn't call it a fully-fledged plan.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: In the case of Cecelia and myself, Kazdel is indeed difficult to enter, and us being Sankta only puts us on the back foot even more...
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: But, if we're talking about a mercenary who made it out of Kazdel...
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: What do you mean...?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: For example, a mercenary who was born in Kazdel, someone like you.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Say she went abroad to earn some money before going back home, and captured two Sankta prisoners along the way. That sounds pretty reasonable, doesn't it?
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Haha... Just an idea that popped into my head, Mudrock. Don't worry too much about it.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: It was only after meeting Flamebringer that I realized I haven't been taking this whole thing seriously enough.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: It sounds reasonable.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: If you make up your mind and decide to take the risk...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Your idea is reasonable and might be worth a shot.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Do you have the courage to try?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: ...Of course.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: If I was afraid of taking risks, I never would've left Laterano.
attributes.name: Enforcer

attributes.content: Mudrock... Ma'am, can I ask you to help with this?
attributes.name: Enforcer
